# Tourma-Line

> Tourma-Line is a spiritual guidance and energy healing practice offering numerology consultations, cartomancy readings, and LAHOCHI energy healing sessions. Line Simon provides personalized accompaniment for life path clarity, emotional healing, and spiritual transformation through remote, in-office, or home visit sessions.

## Key Information

- **Practitioner:** Line Simon (Tourma-Line)
- **Location:** 161 rue Souveraine, 76450 Saint-Riquier-ès-Plains, Normandy, France
- **Service Areas:** Remote (phone, video, Messenger), in-office, and home visits in Gerponville area (Valmont, Fécamp, Cany-Barville, Ourville-en-Caux)
- **Contact:** 06 49 65 31 86 | line.simon.ls@gmail.com
- **Booking:** https://calendly.com/tourma-line/

## Services

### Single Sessions (Promo: 50€ until January 31, 2026 - Regular: 70€ numerology/cartomancy, 60€ LAHOCHI)

- **Numerology & Cartomancy Consultation:** Deep exploration of life path through birth date analysis and card readings. Reveals personality aspects, hidden talents, life challenges, and provides clarity on personal, professional, and romantic questions.
- **LAHOCHI Energy Healing:** High-frequency vibrational energy healing method. Balances chakras, releases energetic blockages, reduces stress, promotes physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual healing. Available remotely or in-person.

### Accompaniment Packages

- **Formule "Harmonie Intérieure" (100€ - Regular: 150€):** 3 sessions over 1 month. Includes 1 numerology/cartomancy session, 1 LAHOCHI session, and message support between sessions. Ideal for emotional balance and understanding repetitive patterns.
- **Formule "Renaissance" (220€ - Regular: 300€):** 3-month deep transformation program. Includes 1 initial combined reading, 3 monthly LAHOCHI sessions, continuous energetic guidance, and 1 closing reading session. Designed for healing trauma, grief, and difficult breakups.

## About the Practice

Tourma-Line combines three complementary modalities:

- **Numerology:** Ancient science studying number vibrations and their impact on personality, destiny, and life events
- **Cartomancy:** Art of card reading for obtaining answers to personal questions and guidance on future direction
- **LAHOCHI:** High-frequency energy healing method for chakra balancing, emotional release, and spiritual transformation

## How Sessions Work

- **À distance (Remote):** Flexible sessions via phone, video call, or Messenger from anywhere
- **Au cabinet (In-office):** Serene private space at 161 rue Souveraine, 76450 Saint-Riquier-ès-Plains (by appointment only)
- **À domicile (Home visits):** Available in Gerponville area and surrounding towns

## Benefits

- Clarity and decision-making support
- Self-knowledge and personal growth
- Release of energetic blockages
- Stress reduction and deep relaxation
- Inner harmony and chakra balance
- Confidence and inner peace
